abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played by Marshall Miles, member of American Bridge Contract League's Hall of Fame who recently died.
lead_paragraph: Marshall Miles of Redlands, Calif., one of the most imaginative bridge players, died on Tuesday.

headline.main: Remembering Marshall Miles, Player and Writer
headline.seo: Bridge - Remembering Marshall Miles, Player and Writer
